Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide against Mycobacterium Tuberculosis That Activates Autophagy Is an Effective Treatment for Tuberculosis.
Literature.Author: Peláez Coyotl EA, Barrios Palacios J, Muciño G, Moreno-Blas D, Costas M, Montiel Montes T, Diener C, Uribe-Carvajal S, Massieu L, Castro-Obregon S, Espinosa OR, Mata Espinosa D, Barrios-Payan J, León Contreras JC, Corzo G, Hernandez-Pando R, del Rio G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:25% Killing=50 µM,Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts (MEF):68% Killing=50 µM,Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:25% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH10B(MIC=20µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae BY4741(MIC=10µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(IC50=99.27µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CIBIN99(IC50=92.66µM)
